00003 cFont::cFont(string fontfile, int width, int height, string ncharacters) 
00004 : characters (ncharacters) {
00005 
00006         char_width = width;
00007         char_height = height;
00008         
00009         glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00010         texture = new cTexture(fontfile);
00011     
00012 }

00014 void cFont::draw(string text) {
00015         
00016         glPushMatrix();
00017         glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00018     texture->bind();
00019 
00020         float xoff = 0;  
00021         GLfloat off = 0; 
00022         
00023         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00024           for (unsigned i=0; i<text.size(); ++i){
00025  
00026                 if (characters.find(text[i]) != string::npos) {
00027                 xoff = characters.find(text[i])*char_width;
00028                 
00029                 // define our vertices and texcoords, starting from the bottom left-hand corner and going clockwise
00030         glTexCoord2f(xoff/1024, 1);
00031         glVertex2f(off+0, 0);
00032         
00033         glTexCoord2f((xoff+char_width)/1024, 1);
00034         glVertex2f(off+char_width, 0);
00035         
00036         glTexCoord2f((xoff+char_width)/1024, 0);
00037         glVertex2f(off+char_width, char_height);
00038         
00039         glTexCoord2f((xoff)/1024, 0);
00040         glVertex2f(off+0, char_height);
00041                 }
00042            off += char_width;
00043          }
00044         glEnd();
00045         glDisable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00046         glPopMatrix();
00047         
00048 }
00049 
00050 void cFont::Test() {
00051 
00052         glPushMatrix();
00053     texture->bind();
00054         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00055                 // define our vertices and texcoords, starting from the bottom left-hand corner and going clockwise
00056                 //glColor3f(1,1,1);
00057         glTexCoord2f(0,0);
00058          glVertex2f (0,0);
00059          
00060         glTexCoord2f(1,0);
00061          glVertex2f (1024,0);
00062          
00063         glTexCoord2f(1,1);
00064          glVertex2f (1024,32);
00065          
00066         glTexCoord2f(0,1);
00067          glVertex2f (0,32);
00068         glEnd();
00069         glPopMatrix();
00070         
00071 }

00074 unsigned cFont::string_width(string str) {
00075         return char_width*str.length();
00076 }
